definition: to join forces/to give full cooperation
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
power/force/strength/ability/strenuously
surname Li
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
worker/workshop/(slang) troublesome/high-maintenance (person)

sentences.english: We sincerely hope of fully cooper-ate with old and new cutomers. to achieve mutual progress.
sentences.chinese: 同時誠望與各新老客戶通力合作，共同拓展。

sentences.english: The new situation calls for intensified cooperation of the international community to jointly meet challenges.
sentences.chinese: 在此形勢下，國際社會應通力合作，共迎挑戰。

sentences.english: I believe now that cooperation is everything.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲當務之急是要通力合作。

sentences.english: It should be a collaborative process for the whole region.
sentences.chinese: 拍電影，應該是整個地區通力合作的過程。

sentences.english: The musician and the librettist were collaborators.
sentences.chinese: 音樂家與劇作者通力合作。

sentences.english: To be successful, all of these teams must collaborate globally.
sentences.chinese: 要獲得成功，所有這些全球分佈的團隊必須通力合作。

sentences.english: I can assure you of our close cooperation.
Concerted efforts must be made to further improve the teaching and learning of the language.
sentences.chinese: 各方必須通力合作，改善語文教學和學習方法。

sentences.english: From the above, one can see the vigorous cooperation between China-India in economic field.
sentences.chinese: 從中我們看到中印在經濟領域的通力合作。

sentences.english: This was cooperation and democracy at their best.
sentences.chinese: 這是通力合作和民主作風的大發揚。

sentences.english: Full co-operation among team members has a direct impact on the success or failure of the team.
sentences.chinese: 團隊成員的通力合作也對會直接影響團隊成功的失敗。

definition: to coordinate closely/to act in close partnership with
to work together/to collaborate
to unite in common effort
cooperation/coordination
to cooperate
(honorific) your kind efforts/thanks to your help
to cooperate/in coordination with/coordinated/collaborate/collaboration/collaborative
to twist together to form a rope/(fig.) to unite/to work together
to cooperate/concerted effort
to lead (an animal by the head)/to take the lead/to coordinate (a combined operation)/to mediate/a go-between (e.g. marriage broker)
to provide assistance/to aid
to tackle a thorny problem and overcome its challenges
to combine/to join/unite/alliance
common/joint/jointly/together/collaborative
all parties (in a dispute etc)/all sides/all directions
lit. to join hands/to act together
